item.title: Is Tilray's Stock Price Surge a Pipe Dream of Political Hype?
item.description: Tilray's stock surge, fueled by political commentary and a technical squeeze, is now focusing market attention on its strong financial health.

item.title: Is Draganfly's Army Partnership a Game-Changer for Investors?
item.description: Draganfly's new partnership with the U.S. Army validates its drone technology and signals a foundational shift in its growth and revenue potential.

item.title: 3 Auto Stocks to Watch as EV and Hybrid Demand Shifts
item.description: GM, Ford, and Tesla are all topping the S&P 500 in 2025 as hybrids, EV demand, and Fed rate cuts fuel auto sales and drive bullish analyst targets.
